name: hermex
description: SWC-based AST parser for analyzing code and React component usage patterns across entire codebases

scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run build -- FIXME WHY PREPUBLISH SCRIPT, ITS SOUNDS LIKE PLACE FOR ISSUES
scripts.test-cli: pnpm run build && node dist/cli.js analyze code-examples/**/*.tsx -l @design-system/foundation
scripts.test-compare: pnpm run build && node dist/cli.js compare code-examples/**/*.tsx -l @mui/material antd @chakra-ui/react
scripts.test-summary: pnpm run build && node dist/cli.js summary code-examples/**/*.tsx
scripts.test-patterns: pnpm run build && node dist/cli.js patterns code-examples/**/*.tsx
scripts.test-stats: pnpm run build && node dist/cli.js stats code-examples/**/*.tsx --chart

author: Gallevy
